channel.title: Ansible Operators on K8S Operators Over EZ
channel.description: Recent content in Ansible Operators on K8S Operators Over EZ

item.description: $ mkdir ansible-operator-overeasy $ cd ansible-operator-overeasy $ operator-sdk init --plugins=ansible --domain mydomain.com operator-sdk create api --group ansible-operators-over-ez --version v1alpha1 --kind AnsibleOpsOverEasy --generate-role ![]("/home/hershey/Pictures/Screenshot from 2020-11-04 13-14-18.png")
